summary: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.
cast: Mike Judge|Bruce Willis|Demi Moore|Cloris Leachman|Robert Stack|Jacqueline Barba|Pamela Blair|Eric Bogosian|Kristofor Brown|Tony Darling|John Doman|Francis Dumaurier|Jim Flaherty|Tim Guinee|David Letterman|Toby Huss|Sam Johnson|Richard Linklater|Rosemary McNamara|Harsh Nayyar|Karen Phillips|Dale Reeves|Michael Ruschak|Gail Thomas|Tom Amundsen|Greg Berg|Bob Bergen|Mary Kay Bergman|Susan Blu|Steve Bulen|Corey Burton|Philip Clarke|Robert Clotworthy|Lisa Kathleen Collins|David Cowgill|Jennifer Darling|Debi Derryberry|Terri Douglas|Chris Edgerly|Paul Eiding|Bill Farmer|Pat Fraley|Eddie Frierson|Jackie Gonneau|Jason Harris|Greg Kinnear|Sherry Lynn|Mona Marshall|Mickie McGowan|Scott Menville|Jonathan Nichols|Paul Pape|Denise Pickering|Patrick Pinney|Phil Proctor|Jan Rabson|David Spade|Pepper Sweeney

title: Beavis y Butt-Head recorren América
